synopsis.text: Mao, a powerful Demon Lord, was once just a humble game master for an online RPG, living an ordinary life as Akira Oono. One fateful day, Akira finds himself transported into the very game he manages, taking on the form and powers of the fearsome Demon Lord. In this new world, he encounters a young, one-legged girl named Aku, and together they embark on a series of adventures. As the infamous Demon Lord, Mao attracts the attention of various nations and holy warriors seeking to defeat him, causing chaos and upheaval wherever they go. With powerful game mechanics and abilities at his disposal, Mao must navigate this diverse and fantastical world filled with saints, demons, and charming companions, all while uncovering the truth behind his mysterious arrival.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
